response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the effort put into its creation. Considering its immense value and potential benefits to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000. This opportunity is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while securing this remarkable product. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can enhance your experience.", "product_price": 10000}
